text: The South Asian Health Foundation (SAHF) is a charity in the UK, founded in 1999 by Kiran Patel and established to improve the health of the UK's South Asian population. In 2015, it was named ‘Diabetes Team of the Year’ at the 2015 British Medical Journal awards. == References == == External links == * Official website Category:Medical associations based in the United Kingdom Category:Organizations established in 1999 Category:1999 establishments in the United Kingdom
title: South Asian Health Foundation
